topic.title: Would ZN survive a total DNS shutdown?
topic.body: Hypothetically if all the major DNS providers were compelled to shutdown for a while, would this system still function? Yes, I am new.

topic.title: 08chan content publish failed
topic.body: Am I the only one that cannot post to 08chan? I get a content publish failed error every time.

topic.title: Just a reminder
topic.body: When you visit stuff, your instance of ZN makes a copy, and then seeds it out. This means that whatever you post also takes up space on other peoples computers. When you're posting here, keep an eye on that little xx/50k thing at the bottom right of the box. That is the maximum amount of space that you're allowed to comsume. You'll need to delete old posts when you come close to your 50k threshold.

1611191837_16NS3rBdW9zpLmLSQoD8nLTtNVsRF.body: Of course it's a scam. Biden was manufactured as the annointed one from the very start. That fact that they can do this should be a pretty strong indicator who has the power. Good luck doing anything about it.

1611308558_1NZftAz9VSawGF5JgMYGFv4ByoKEa.body:
I used to be that way. I wanted to live and let live with everyone, and pretty well leave everyone alone.
Now I think that the vast majority of people are just automatons with no will of their own. If it was up to me, I would train up a contingent of ideologically similar, thoughtful, educated, caretakers. We will then exterminate almost all adults over the age of 15 And at that point we would start from scratch. If after a couple of generations people are just still fucked like they are now then I say we nuke the entire thing, And ensure that the earth remains a toxic radiated barren hellscape for at least 1 million years.

> [patriotbase](#comment_1_139pHaxesZa11czwptXVY62ZrNWUh4NxRQ): Bill Gates, is that you?

Nah, but after years of opposing everything he stands for I'm starting to come around.
